ValidationRule.description: 28051 Unless updating a historical record then changing the WO should never happen. SF doesn't allow reparenting SAs and neither do we!
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Profile_Name__c <> 'System Administrator', RecordType.DeveloperName <> '', ISCHANGED( Work_Order__c ), PRIORVALUE(Work_Order__c)<>'')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Work Order should not be changed unless it was previously blank
